content: ruffles are worked last abbreviations k knit p purl ktbl knit through the back loop yo yarn over sl1 slip one stitch purlwise st s stitch es m1r make one right with your left needle pick up a strand between 2 stitches from back to front and knit m1l make one left with your left needle pick up a strand between 2 stitches from front to back and knit through the back loop © kaidi rand @rannapiigaknits | personal use only | v 3 2 3 #fluffywavessocks k2tog knit two together ssk slip slip knit p2tog purl two together bor beginning of round mrm mid-round marker hm 1 2 heel marker 1 2 sm slip marker rs right side ws wrong side instructions toe cast on 16 16 20 sts 8 8 10 sts per needle with judy s magic cast on tutorial link on page 8 or a similar method place markers at the beginning of the round bor and after 8 8 10 sts mrm r1 knit all sts r2 *k1 m1r knit to 1 st before mrm m1l k1* sm repeat from * to bor increase 4 sts repeat r2 for a total of 5 6 6 times you now have 36 40 44 sts next by size sizes s & m repeat r1-r2 until there are 56 64 sts 28 32 sts per needle size l repeat r1-r2 5 times ending with 64 sts then work *r1 twice then r2* repeating from *to* once more you now have 72 sts 36 sts per needle © kaidi rand @rannapiigaknits | personal use only | v 3 2 4 #fluffywavessocks foot continue in stockinette until the work measures approximately 8 9 10 cm less than the desired foot length about 1 5 cm negative ease included heel turn adds 1-1 5 cm length proceed to the gusset section optional modifications for more experienced knitters include adding lace or cables instructions not included to the instep or incorporating a contrast color cc and beginning helical knitting a short tutorial link provided on page 8 helical knitting works best if switching colors starts and remains at bor gusset increases set-up round knit to mrm remove marker if not using any additional lace or cable pattern on the instep k13 15 17 and place hm1 k2 place hm2 k13 15 17 to bor r1 k to hm1 sm m1r k to hm2 m1l sm k to bor increase 2 sts r2 knit all sts repeat r1-r2 13 15 17 more times you now have 30 34 38 sts between hm1 and hm2 heel turn to shape the heel turn work back and forth across the row while decreasing sts on either side of the heel tab r1 rs knit to hm1 sm k11 12 13 place marker a k8 10 12 ssk k1 turn decrease 1 st r2 ws sl1 p to marker a remove marker a p2tog p1 turn decrease 1 st r3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before
